patthana16.31:1.1: Pītisahagataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
patthana16.31:2.1: Pītisahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
